comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: The 1912 summer Olympics were held in Stockholm: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1912_Summer_Olympics Here are the 1912 swimming medalists, including some Americans: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1912_Summer_Olympics

comment.author: 7830375@N04
comment._content: They look more like wrestlers than swimmers compared to today's standards. Note the well placed star on the swim trunks.
